question: If Anna has 3 apples and buys 2 more, then gives 1 to Bob, how many apples does she have?
Tom had 12 candies. He ate 5 and then bought 4 more. How many does he have now?
A box has 8 pencils. Sarah adds 7, then loses 3. How many pencils are in the box?
There are 15 birds on a tree. 6 fly away, then 4 come back. How many now?
John read 9 pages on Monday and 7 on Tuesday. He reread 3 pages. Total new pages read?
